trends: There have been no other sightings in Macdoel
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: it appeared on the ground in total darkness, pulsating lights
divs: Sighting DetailsMy 17 year old son and I were driving from Reno,NV to Macdoel, CA and took a wrong turn in Macdoel it was pitch black, we flipped a uturn and came upon a huge object (passenger side) already landed. We stopped the car right in the road. It was oval shaped, no sound, I felt no fear, pulsating from left to right, right to left different colors, I saw yellow and blue, my son later said he saw yellow and green. I said to my son, "What is that cody," he said its not a UFO," I said," then what is it, we kept repeating that about 3 times. We don't know what it was, I know one thing. My son and I saw the same thing. I felt that I need to drive on because my son was with me. I describe it as 2 regular car lengths, oval shape.
